title: Quinoa Salad
description: A refreshing quinoa salad packed with vegetables.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop cucumber and tomato.
Mix everything with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Simple grilled salmon with lemon butter.
steps: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon skin side down for 5–6 mins.
Melt butter with garlic and lemon juice.
Drizzle sauce over salmon and serve.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Colorful stir fry with seasonal vegetables.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add chopped vegetables.
Stir fry for 5–7 mins.
Add soy sauce and serve hot.

title: Berry Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered parfait with Greek yogurt and fresh berries.
steps: Layer Greek yogurt in a glass.
Add strawberries and blueberries.
Top with granola and a drizzle of honey.

title: Lentil Soup
description: Comforting soup made with lentils and spices.
steps: Rinse and cook lentils in broth.
Add chopped onion and carrots.
Season with spices and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Chicken Wrap
description: Whole wheat wrap filled with grilled chicken and veggies.
steps: Grill chicken until golden.
Place chicken and veggies on wrap.
Add yogurt sauce.
Roll tightly and serve.

title: Chia Pudding
description: Creamy chia seed pudding with almond milk.
steps: Mix chia seeds with almond milk.
Refrigerate overnight.
Top with banana slices and honey before serving.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice and beans.
steps: Cook rice and beans together.
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Stuff peppers with rice mixture.
Top with cheese and bake for 20 minutes.
